com.marshalchen.common.commonUtils.basicUtils

类 CrashHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.marshalchen.common.commonUtils.basicUtils.CrashHandler
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.lang.Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler

    public class CrashHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler
    Catch the uncaught exception Usage: CrashHandler crashHandler = CrashHandler.getInstance(); crashHandler.init(getApplicationContext(), "/crash/", "Something error,please try again");
